t: Amazon.com | Glencairn Whisky Glass Set of 4: Cordial Glasses: Tumblers & Water Glasses
s: The Glencairn glass was originally designed for pub/bar use so it is a sturdy little glass. The bottom is heavy so it's not easily tipped over and is easily grasped. It feels good in the hand. The only glass that would provide a better hand feel (in my opinion) would be a small brandy snifter.
